title: YouTube to WhatsApp Sales Automation with WordPress, FluentCRM and Whinta
author: GYANENDRA DWIVEDI
readme:
# 🚀 **WhatsApp Automation Template**

## Designed & Developed by Infridet Solutions Private Limited

* * *

# **🔧 Objective:**

Automate your lead nurturing and sales process from YouTube/Instagram → Landing Page → CRM → Email → WhatsApp → Sales → Deal Closure using tools like:

  * 🌐 **WordPress** (Landing Page + Fluent Forms)
  * 🧾 **Google Sheets** (Backup Log)
  * 📩 **FluentCRM** (Lead Tagging + Email Sequences)
  * 💬 **[Whinta.com](http://Whinta.com)** (WhatsApp Messaging API)
  * ⚙️ **N8N** (Workflow Automation Engine)



* * *

# **🧩 System Flow Overview:**

  1. **Lead Source** : YouTube or Instagram CTA
  2. **Landing Page** : Built on WordPress with a story-driven design
  3. **Form Capture** : Fluent Forms with dynamic input fields
  4. **Data Sync** : 
     * Backup to Google Sheets
     * Push lead to FluentCRM and tag as `New Lead`
  5. **Email Sequence** : 
     * Warm-up emails (1 to 5)
     * Introduce offer or service
  6. **WhatsApp Outreach** : 
     * Send personalized message via Whinta
     * Triggered 1 hour after form fill or last email
  7. **Sales Follow-Up** : 
     * Sales team handles replies manually
     * CRM tag updated to `Customer` upon closing



* * *

# **📁 Folder Structure (Optional Git/Zip File):**
    
    
    📦 WhatsApp-Automation-Infridet/
    │
    ├── whatsapp-automation-n8n.json      # N8N Flowchart Import File
    ├── email-templates.docx              # Warm-up Email Scripts
    ├── whinta-api-integration.pdf        # API Documentation
    ├── crm-tagging-notes.txt             # CRM Tag Setup Details
    └── readme.md                         # This Instruction File
    

* * *

# **🛠️ Required Integrations & Setup**

### ✅ **Fluent Forms (WordPress)**

  * Embed form with Name, Email, Phone
  * Enable webhook to N8N: `/lead-capture`



### ✅ **Google Sheets**

  * Use `n8n-nodes-base.googleSheets` node
  * Capture name, email, phone, source, timestamp



### ✅ **FluentCRM**

  * REST API enabled
  * Push contact and assign tag `New Lead`
  * Setup Email Automation via tag trigger



### ✅ **SMTP Email (Optional)**

  * Use Gmail SMTP or Brevo
  * Trigger email on form submission



### ✅ **[Whinta.com](http://Whinta.com) (WhatsApp API)**

  * Send POST request
  * Payload includes `phone`, `message`, `sender_id`
  * Customize message with personalization



* * *

# **💬 Sample WhatsApp Message:**
    
    
    Hey {{name}}, Gyan here from Account Craft 👋  
    I saw your form submission – would you like help in starting your YouTube journey this week?  
    Let me know. I'm just one text away. ✅  
    

* * *

# **📧 Sample Email (Warmup Day 1):**

> **Subject** : Welcome to Account Craft 🚀  
>  **Body** :  
>  Hi {{name}},
> 
> I’m Gyan from Account Craft. Thanks for joining us!  
>  Here’s what’s coming next: exclusive videos, personalized tips, and real support to get your YouTube channel earning.
> 
> Let’s go!  
>  – Gyan

* * *

# **🔁 CRM Tag Updates:**

Action | Tag Assigned  
---|---  
On form fill | `New Lead`  
After WhatsApp | `Engaged`  
After sale closed | `Customer`  
  
* * *

# **📌 Final Output:**

Once completed, the system will:

  * Log all leads into a database
  * Automatically send emails and WhatsApp messages
  * Notify your sales team
  * Update lead status without manual entry



* * *

> _Automation Template Designed & Deployed by_  
>  **Infridet Solutions Private Limited**  
>  _Smart Integrations. Seamless Business._  
>  🌐 [www.infridetsolutions.com](http://www.infridetsolutions.com) | 📞 +91-8853354829

🚀 WhatsApp Automation Template

Designed & Developed by Infridet Solutions Private Limited

🔧 Objective:

Automate your lead nurturing and sales process from YouTube/Instagram → Landing Page → CRM → Email → WhatsApp → Sales → Deal Closure using tools like:

  • 🌐 WordPress (Landing Page + Fluent Forms)
  • 🧾 Google Sheets (Backup Log)
  • 📩 FluentCRM (Lead Tagging + Email Sequences)
  • 💬 Whinta.com (WhatsApp Messaging API)
  • ⚙️ N8N (Workflow Automation Engine)

🧩 System Flow Overview:

  1. Lead Source: YouTube or Instagram CTA
  2. Landing Page: Built on WordPress with a story-driven design
  3. Form Capture: Fluent Forms with dynamic input fields
  4. Data Sync:
    • Backup to Google Sheets
    • Push lead to FluentCRM and tag as New Lead
  5. Email Sequence:
    • Warm-up emails (1 to 5)
    • Introduce offer or service
  6. WhatsApp Outreach:
    • Send personalized message via Whinta
    • Triggered 1 hour after form fill or last email
  7. Sales Follow-Up:
    • Sales team handles replies manually
    • CRM tag updated to Customer upon closing

📁 Folder Structure (Optional Git/Zip File):

📦 WhatsApp-Automation-Infridet/
│
├── whatsapp-automation-n8n.json      # N8N Flowchart Import File
├── email-templates.docx              # Warm-up Email Scripts
├── whinta-api-integration.pdf        # API Documentation
├── crm-tagging-notes.txt             # CRM Tag Setup Details
└── readme.md                         # This Instruction File

🛠️ Required Integrations & Setup

✅ Fluent Forms (WordPress)

  • Embed form with Name, Email, Phone
  • Enable webhook to N8N: /lead-capture

✅ Google Sheets

  • Use n8n-nodes-base.googleSheets node
  • Capture name, email, phone, source, timestamp

✅ FluentCRM

  • REST API enabled
  • Push contact and assign tag New Lead
  • Setup Email Automation via tag trigger

✅ SMTP Email (Optional)

  • Use Gmail SMTP or Brevo
  • Trigger email on form submission

✅ Whinta.com (WhatsApp API)

  • Send POST request
  • Payload includes phone, message, sender_id
  • Customize message with personalization

💬 Sample WhatsApp Message:

Hey {{name}}, Gyan here from Account Craft 👋  
I saw your form submission – would you like help in starting your YouTube journey this week?  
Let me know. I'm just one text away. ✅

📧 Sample Email (Warmup Day 1):

Subject: Welcome to Account Craft 🚀
Body:
Hi {{name}},

I’m Gyan from Account Craft. Thanks for joining us!
Here’s what’s coming next: exclusive videos, personalized tips, and real support to get your YouTube channel earning.

Let’s go!
– Gyan

🔁 CRM Tag Updates:

Action Tag Assigned
On form fill New Lead
After WhatsApp Engaged
After sale closed Customer

📌 Final Output:

Once completed, the system will:

  • Log all leads into a database
  • Automatically send emails and WhatsApp messages
  • Notify your sales team

readme_zh:
# 🚀 **WhatsApp自动化模板**

## 由Infridet解决方案有限公司设计与开发

* * *

# **🔧 目标：**

通过以下工具实现从YouTube/Instagram→落地页→CRM→邮件→WhatsApp→销售→成交的全流程自动化：
  * 🌐 **WordPress**（落地页+Fluent Forms表单工具）
  * 🧾 **Google表格**（备份日志）
  * 📩 **FluentCRM**（线索标签+邮件序列）
  * 💬 **[Whinta.com](http://Whinta.com)**（WhatsApp消息API）
  * ⚙️ **N8N**（工作流自动化引擎）

* * *

# **🧩 系统流程概览：**

  1. **线索来源**：YouTube或Instagram的行动号召
  2. **落地页**：基于WordPress构建的故事化设计页面
  3. **表单捕获**：带动态输入字段的Fluent Forms
  4. **数据同步**：
     * 备份至Google表格
     * 推送线索至FluentCRM并标记为`新线索`
  5. **邮件序列**：
     * 预热邮件（1-5封）
     * 介绍优惠或服务
  6. **WhatsApp触达**：
     * 通过Whinta发送个性化消息
     * 在表单提交或最后一封邮件后1小时触发
  7. **销售跟进**：
     * 销售团队手动处理回复
     * 成交后CRM标签更新为`客户`

* * *

# **📁 文件夹结构（可选Git/压缩包）：**
    
    
    📦 WhatsApp自动化-Infridet/
    │
    ├── whatsapp自动化-n8n.json      # N8N流程图导入文件
    ├── 邮件模板.docx                # 预热邮件脚本
    ├── whinta-api集成.pdf           # API文档
    ├── crm标签说明.txt              # CRM标签设置详情
    └── 自述文件.md                  # 本说明文档
    

* * *

# **🛠️ 所需集成与设置**

### ✅ **Fluent Forms（WordPress）**
  * 嵌入含姓名、邮箱、电话的表单
  * 启用至N8N的webhook：`/lead-capture`

### ✅ **Google表格**
  * 使用`n8n-nodes-base.googleSheets`节点
  * 捕获姓名、邮箱、电话、来源、时间戳

### ✅ **FluentCRM**
  * 启用REST API
  * 推送联系人并分配`新线索`标签
  * 设置基于标签触发的邮件自动化

### ✅ **SMTP邮件（可选）**
  * 使用Gmail SMTP或Brevo
  * 表单提交时触发邮件

### ✅ **[Whinta.com](http://Whinta.com)（WhatsApp API）**
  * 发送POST请求
  * 载荷包含`电话`、`消息`、`发送者ID`
  * 个性化定制消息

* * *

# **💬 WhatsApp消息示例：**
    
    
    嗨{{name}}，我是Account Craft的Gyan 👋  
    注意到您提交了表单——需要本周启动YouTube频道的帮助吗？  
    随时联系，我就在线等您。✅  
    

* * *

# **📧 邮件示例（预热第1天）：**

> **主题**：欢迎加入Account Craft 🚀  
>  **正文**：  
>  您好{{name}}，
> 
> 我是Account Craft的Gyan。感谢您的关注！  
>  接下来您将获得：独家视频、个性化建议，以及让YouTube频道盈利的实际支持。
> 
> 让我们开始吧！  
>  – Gyan

* * *

# **🔁 CRM标签更新：**

操作 | 分配标签  
---|---  
表单提交时 | `新线索`  
WhatsApp发送后 | `已互动`  
成交后 | `客户`  

* * *

# **📌 最终效果：**

系统完成后将实现：
  * 所有线索存入数据库
  * 自动发送邮件和WhatsApp消息
  * 通知销售团队
  * 无需手动更新线索状态

* * *

> _自动化模板由_  
>  **Infridet解决方案有限公司** _设计部署_  
>  _智能集成·无缝业务_  
>  🌐 [www.infridetsolutions.com](http://www.infridetsolutions.com) | 📞 +91-8853354829
title_zh: YouTube到WhatsApp销售自动化：基于WordPress、FluentCRM与Whinta的解决方案
